sentences.english: Come, join us in the magic of the Pacific and the pageantry of its people.
sentences.chinese: 來吧，請加入我們太平洋的奇幻世界和壯觀的人羣。

sentences.english: Taking me away from the pain in my life and filling my heart with joy and wonder.
sentences.chinese: 把我從生活中的痛苦抽離，在我的心注滿歡樂和奇幻。

sentences.english: A fantasy novel can be a ticket to a land of magic.
sentences.chinese: 奇幻小說就像一張通向魔法世界的門票。

sentences.english: As Piscean mothers are born daydreamers and live in the world of fantasy.
sentences.chinese: 雙魚座媽媽是個天生的空想家，生活在奇幻世界裏。

sentences.english: The popularity of the movie has not waned till today. The music of the movie was fantastic.
sentences.chinese: 該片的流行程度至今不減，電影音樂堪稱奇幻。

sentences.english: We have as nice a spring , just as a magic story.
sentences.chinese: 我們的青春如此美妙，就像奇幻的魔法故事。

sentences.english: As Piscean mothers are daydreamers and live in the world of fantasy.
sentences.chinese: 雙魚媽媽是個天生的空想家，生活在奇幻世界裏。

sentences.english: Just consider some recent fantasy and science fiction movies.
sentences.chinese: 只要想想一些最近的奇幻和科幻電影就知道了。

sentences.english: All kinds of incredible imagination can be created on a blank sheet of paper.
sentences.chinese: 空白的畫紙，能變化出各種不可思議的奇幻異想。

sentences.english: The Lord of the Rings, a three volume fantasy adventure epic authored by J. R.
sentences.chinese: 《魔戒》，三卷奇幻史詩鉅著，作者是享有盛譽的J。

sentences.english: A fantasy novel can be a ticket to a land of magic. The Lord of the Rings by J.
sentences.chinese: 奇幻小說就像一張通向魔法世界的門票。

sentences.english: This fantasy tells the story of Prince Dastan.
sentences.chinese: 這部奇幻片描述達斯坦王子的故事。

sentences.english: Earthsea is a fantastic action-adventure saga, which is comparable to the Lord of the Rings.
sentences.chinese: 《地海傳說》是一部與《魔戒》齊名的奇幻歷險故事。

sentences.english: Fantasy as a genre is often unfairly maligned.
sentences.chinese: 奇幻題材的小說常常遭到不公的非議。

sentences.english: He blinks, the strange hues of the alien vision flooding his brain.
sentences.chinese: 他着眨眼，奇幻的外星景象充斥着他的頭腦。

definition: science fiction/abbr. for 科學幻想|科学幻想[ke1 xue2 huan4 xiang3]
martial arts chivalry (Chinese literary, theatrical and cinema genre)/knight-errant
ancient Chinese divination tradition (still in use today)
